woldsvaults:default.NAME: Test Recipe
woldsvaults:default.DESCRIPTION: This should never be seen in normal gameplay.

woldsvaults:standard_trinket_pouch.NAME: Standard Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:standard_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: An improved trinket pouch that can store one of each trinket type. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:light_trinket_pouch.NAME: Arcane Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:light_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two blue trinkets and one green trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:heavy_trinket_pouch.NAME: Mercenary's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:heavy_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two red trinkets and one green trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:explorer_trinket_pouch.NAME: Explorer's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:explorer_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two green trinkets and one blue trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:wizard_trinket_pouch.NAME: Wizard's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:wizard_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two blue trinkets and one red trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:slayer_trinket_pouch.NAME: Slayer's Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:slayer_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store two red trinkets and one blue trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:looters_trinket_pouch.NAME: Looter's Dream Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:looters_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE green trinkets. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:warrior_trinket_pouch.NAME: Warrior Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:warrior_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE red trinkets. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:hyper_trinket_pouch.NAME: Hyper Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:hyper_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: A special trinket pouch that can store THREE blue trinkets. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:prismatic_trinket_pouch.NAME: Prismatic Trinket Pouch
woldsvaults:prismatic_trinket_pouch.DESCRIPTION: The premier and ultimate trinket pouch, capable of holding 2 of each type of trinket. Crafted in Weaving Station.

woldsvaults:zephyr_charm.NAME: Zephyr Charm
woldsvaults:zephyr_charm.DESCRIPTION: An incredibly powerful unbreakable blue trinket that greatly improves your movement in vaults.
